name: Scazlab2016
tagline: A repo for the code I write in preparation for and while working at Yale's Social Robotics Lab for 2016
body:
In this section I will show the work I did in preparation for the lab, do a daily write up while working there and the paper, presentation and poster I create in the fall.

#Preparation

#Working in ScazLab

###6/13/16
As I settled in today I finished setting up my virtual machine so I can use it full time for programming and I began working through Olivier's code.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
